alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:35AM CST until February 01 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Chandlerville. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 456.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 456.6 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 456.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Sangamon River Chandlerville 456.6 456.2 Sun 7 am CST 456.0 456.3 456.6 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to remain aware of the latest forecasts and associated flood risk for their area. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
